column5: Just got back from Caribou Lake. Once again the Bear Paw Lodge provided great cabins and boats. First couple days were great. Sunny and in the 80's. Then the smoke moved in for a bit and then a little rain, wind, and some cooler weather. All in all a great trip. Caught a couple 25 inchers, and lots of eaters. My dad caught a great walleye. On the last day and last hour of fishing, he hauled in a 31 inch Walleye, 8 pound, 7 ounces. He did not catch many fish, but sure ended the trip with a great fish.
